question: An ant can lift 1000 times its weight.
Galapagos tortoises sleep up to 16 hours a day
The letter H is between letters G and J on a keyboard
If you add the two numbers on the opposite side of dice together, the answer is always 7
New York is nicknamed “The Big Orange”
The moon is just 50 percent of the mass of Earth.
There is a world championship for throwing mobile phones.
A double rainbow is a mirror image of the first rainbow
Penguins propose to each other with singing
When we breathe through our nose, we always inhale more air from one nostril than with the other one - and theis changes every 15 minutes
